fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Spread your poison in someone's house, infecting all visitors with a sleeper poison.
- Trigger your poison, dealing an infected target a Powerful attack during the day. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You know the names of infected targets at all times.
- Anyone who visits or is visited by infected targets gets infected.
- Triggering the poison will disable the next night's factional attack.
- If all non-mafia players are infected, Town's next lynch will be disabled.
